code_snippet:
def format_stash_item(fields, index=-1):

    title = fields['alias']

    description = fields['desc']

    item_num = index + 1

    if index == -1:

        return f'{UNDERLINE}{BOLD}$ {title}{END_FORMAT}\n\n{description}\n'

    return f'{UNDERLINE}{BOLD}$ [{item_num}] {title}{END_FORMAT}\n\n{description}\n'
